usefulItems: round cake tin (Ø 20 cm), baking paper, wooden skewer, oven
title: Cardamom And Lime Syrup Cake

ingredients.content: 200 g unsalted butter, softened, plus extra for greasing

preparations.content: Preheat oven to 170°C. Grease and line a round cake tin (Ø 20 cm) with baking paper then set aside.
Place cardamom pods in mixing bowl and chop <b>10 sec/speed 6<b> to separate seeds. Remove and discard pods, leaving seeds in mixing bowl.
Add sugar and grind <b>10 sec/speed 10<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add cashews and grind <b>3 sec/speed 6<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add butter, yoghurt and eggs then mix <b>15 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.

Add flour and mix with aid of spatula <b>10 sec/speed 4<b>, or until combined. Transfer to prepared cake tin and bake for 55 minutes (170°C), or until a skewer inserted in centre comes out clean. Clean mixing bowl.
Place sugar and lime zest in mixing bowl then grind <b>20 sec/speed 9<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.

Add lime juice and water then cook <b>5 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>. Pierce cake all over using wooden skewer and pour sauce over warm cake while still in tin. Allow to cool in tin (approx. 20 minutes) before serving.

hintsAndTricks: <b>2 tsp<b> ground cardamom can be used instead of cardamom pods. Omit <b>step 2<b> then add ground cardamom with sugar in <b>step 3<b>.
This cake has a strong cardamom flavour. If preferred, reduce cardamom pods to <b>2 tsp<b> and proceed as per recipe.
